subject: Golf
organizations: Champions Tour Bank of America Championship
lead_paragraph: Jeff Sluman birdied three of the last four holes and won the Champions Tour Bank of America Championship in Concord, Mass., by two strokes. He birdied the 15th to break a tie with Loren Roberts, then made putts of more than 30 feet on the 17th and 18th. Roberts was the second-round leader.
